name: io.github.renjiyun06/understand-code
description: Anti-cognitive-debt MCP server. Quizzes developers on code they didn't write (or accepted from AI). Generates comprehension questions, tracks scores, identifies knowledge gaps. The only tool that measures whether you actually understand AI-generated code.

tools.name: quiz
tools.description: Generate comprehension questions for a code file to verify understanding

tools.name: score
tools.description: Evaluate answers to quiz questions and calculate comprehension percentage

tools.name: summary
tools.description: Get comprehension stats across all quizzed files

tools.name: debt
tools.description: Show files with lowest comprehension scores (highest cognitive debt)

tools.name: history
tools.description: Show quiz history for a specific file or all files
